column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My party of 5 came here for dinner around 6 PM and the wait for a table was about 45 minutes so we decided to just grab a table at the bar area. The tables at the bar area is first come
column2: first serve and they still offer the entire menu of the restaurant. Shortly after we ordered our food
column3: I got a text saying our table was ready on the restaurant side but we decided not to move.
